original_title: The Miranda Murders: Lost Tapes of Leonard Lake and Charles Ng
overview: Delve into the minds of serial killers Leonard Lake and Charlie Ng with this horrifying found footage film, spanning the 1983-1984 killing spree that shocked California and the nation.

production_companies.name: Shockfest Horror Factory, Sepulture Productions, Claveria Caliber Cinema

title: The Miranda Murders: Lost Tapes of Leonard Lake and Charles Ng
